title: Virtual reality enables real-time, internal view of patient anatomy during treatment

title_detail.value: Virtual reality enables real-time, internal view of patient anatomy during treatment

summary: Immersive virtual reality (VR) may enable interventional radiologists to improve treatments using real-time 3D images from inside a patient's blood vessels. New research shows that the interactive technology could provide faster, more efficient treatment, with less radiation exposure and greater precision, ease and confidence.
